/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrOrgApvDDao.selectOrOrgApvD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.CRD_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) CRD_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.AGN_CRD_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGN_CRD_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.HODP_POSIT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) HODP_POSIT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.SENDR_NM_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) SENDR_NM_RESC_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.ORG_ID, T.CRD_ORG_ID, T.CRD_RESC_ID, T.AGN_CRD_ORG_ID, T.AGN_CRD_RESC_ID, T.REAL_CRD_ORG_ID, T.HODP_POSIT_RESC_ID, T.SENDR_NM_RESC_ID, T.RECV_DEPT_ID, T.INSP_YN, T.OFSE_ID,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.CRD_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) CRD_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.AGN_CRD_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGN_CRD_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.HODP_POSIT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) HODP_POSIT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.SENDR_NM_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) SENDR_NM_RESC_NM,
FROM OR_ORG_APV_D T
AND T.ORG_ID = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.CRD_ORG_ID = #{crdOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AGN_CRD_ORG_ID = #{agnCrdOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.REAL_CRD_ORG_ID = #{realCrdOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ORG_ID IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ORG_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
